fields.title: amount
fields.description: An `integer` of the experience to add to the player. May only be negative to remove xp.

fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player who should receive or lose xp.

overloads.title: Add XP
overloads.description: `Add` a given positive `integer` amount of `xp` to the target `player`.

overloads.title: Remove XP
overloads.description: `Remove` a given negative `integer` amount of `xp` from the target `player`.
